name: Bee's eye
description:
Submission to Minijam 109 - Depths with https://muddhunt.itch.io/

--Beest experienced in fullscreen--

Bee the one to retrieve the queen bee's crown stolen by the ant army and stored in the depths of their anthill.

Harder mode and speedrun mode available, bee sure to post your best times in the comments ;)

Have fun killing ants!

CONTROLS : 

WASD/ZQSD/ARROWS : MOVEMENT

MOUSE CLICK/SPACEBAR : SHOOT AND PULL BACK YOUR STINGER
